Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE COMPREHENSIVE SARCOMA PANEL, NEXT-GENERATION SEQUENCING (NGS), TUMOR
Purpose: To identify clinically significant genetic variants in sarcoma tumors through next-generation sequencing, ensuring accurate, reliable, and reproducible results.
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina or ThermoFisher), DNA extraction kit, library preparation kit, PCR thermocycler, Agilent Bioanalyzer, Qubit fluorometer
